recipes.name: ChefRich Golden Digestive Elixir
ingredients: 3 inches fresh organic ginger root, peeled
3 tablespoons raw honey or pure maple syrup
instructions: Juice fresh ginger using a high-quality juicer
Slowly whisk honey into ginger juice until emulsified
Add lemon juice and salt to enhance absorption
Take 1-2 tablespoons 15 minutes before meals

recipes.name: ChefRich Gut-Healing Garden Minestrone
ingredients: 1 cup dried cannellini beans, soaked overnight
instructions: Cook beans with rosemary until tender (45 minutes)
Heat olive oil, sauté onion and leek until golden
Add carrots and celery, cook until softening
Add garlic for 1 minute until fragrant
Add tomatoes and zucchini, cook until tomatoes break down
Add vegetable broth and cooked beans with liquid
Simmer 20 minutes until vegetables are tender
Stir in bread cubes during last 5 minutes
Finish with apple cider vinegar and fresh basil
healthBenefits: Prebiotic fiber feeds beneficial gut bacteria

recipes.name: ChefRich Detox Power Greens with Walnut Crunch
ingredients: 1/2 cup kalamata olives, pitted and halved
3/4 cup walnuts, toasted and roughly chopped
instructions: Wash arugula thoroughly and spin dry
Toast walnuts in dry pan until fragrant (3 minutes)
In blender, puree olives, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and half the walnuts
Add water if dressing needs thinning
Toss arugula with dressing just before serving
Top with remaining toasted walnuts

recipes.name: ChefRich Heart-Healthy Butternut Cannelloni
instructions: Roast butternut squash cut-side down at 400°F for 40-45 minutes
Grill portobello mushrooms with balsamic until tender
Sauté onion until caramelized, add pepper flakes
Combine squash, mushrooms, sage, pine nuts, and ricotta
Roast tomatoes with thyme at 350°F until soft, then blend
Cut pasta into squares, fill with mixture and roll
Bake cannelloni with tomato sauce at 375°F for 25 minutes
healthBenefits: Healthy fats from olive oil and nuts

recipes.name: ChefRich Immune-Boosting Spiced Citrus Bowl
ingredients: 3-inch piece fresh ginger, sliced into coins
instructions: Combine water, 1/2 cup maple syrup, ginger, star anise, cloves, and lemon zest
Bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer until reduced to 1 cup
Strain syrup and let cool completely
Zest 2 oranges finely, mix with 1 tablespoon maple syrup
Supreme all oranges and grapefruits (remove pith and membranes)
Combine citrus segments with quartered figs
Pour cooled spiced syrup over fruit
Marinate 30-60 minutes before serving
Garnish with sweetened orange zest
healthBenefits: High vitamin C boosts immune function

recipes.name: ChefRich Fire-Starting Digestive Shot
ingredients: 2 inches fresh ginger root, peeled and finely chopped
instructions: Finely chop fresh ginger (or use microplane grater)
Add fresh lemon juice to ginger
Add pinch of coarse sea salt
Optional: add apple cider vinegar for extra digestive power
Mix well and let sit 2-3 minutes
Take 1 tablespoon before meals
Can be stored in refrigerator for 2 days
